blocks.name: GRIDDATA
blocks.description: Initial head values for all cells in the model grid.

variables.name: STRT
variables.description: Starting head for each cell at the beginning of the simulation.
variables.tooltip: Initial head values used as the starting condition for the first time step. For steady-state simulations, these serve as the initial guess for the iterative solver. Should be set above cell bottoms for active cells to avoid dry cells at startup.
